name: py-biobb-structure-checking

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Biobb_structure_checking provides a series of functions to check the
quality of a 3D structure intended to facilitate the setup of a
molecular dynamics simulation of protein or nucleic acids systems

dependencies.name: py-biopython
dependencies.description:
A distributed collaborative effort to develop Python libraries and
applications which address the needs of current and future work in
bioinformatics.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-psutil
dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-biobb-structure-utils
dependent_to.description:
Biobb_structure_utils is the Biobb module collection to modify or
extract information from a PDB structure file, such as pulling out a
particular model or chain, removing water molecules or ligands, or
renumbering or sorting atoms or residues

dependent_to.name: py-biobb-model
dependent_to.description:
Biobb_model is the Biobb module collection to check and model 3d
structures, create mutations or reconstruct missing atoms
